name: UpdateFreshserviceChangeTimeEntry
description:
Update a time entry on a Freshservice Change request.

Use this tool to modify an existing time entry for a Change request in Freshservice, specifying the Change ID and the Time Entry ID to update.

parameters.name: change_request_id
parameters.description: ID of the change request to be updated.

parameters.name: time_entry_identifier
parameters.description: Provide the integer ID of the time entry to be updated.

parameters.name: time_entry_details
parameters.description: JSON object containing time entry details to be updated, such as start_time, time_spent, and custom_fields.

id.description: Unique ID of the time entry

task_id.description: Unique ID of the task associated with the time entry

parent_id.description: Unique ID of the parent entity to which the time entry belongs

parent_type.description: Type of the parent entity - [Ticket, Problem, Change, Release, Project]

start_time.description: Time at which the timer started

time_spent.description: Duration of time spent in seconds

timer_running.description: true if timer is running, false otherwise

agent_id.description: Unique ID of the user who created the time entry

note.description: Description note of the time entry

created_at.description: Timestamp at which the time entry is created

updated_at.description: Time stamp at which the time entry is updated

executed_at.description: Date time at which the time entry is executed

custom_fields.description: Key value pairs containing the names and values of custom fields

value_schema.description: time entry details that needs to be updated

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the Freshservice API.

parameters.name: requestBody
parameters.description: time entry details that needs to be updated

id.description: Unique ID of the time entry

task_id.description: Unique ID of the task associated with the time entry

parent_id.description: Unique ID of the parent entity to which the time entry belongs

parent_type.description: Type of the parent entity - [Ticket, Problem, Change, Release, Project]

start_time.description: Time at which the timer started

time_spent.description: Duration of time spent in seconds

timer_running.description: true if timer is running, false otherwise

agent_id.description: Unique ID of the user who created the time entry

note.description: Description note of the time entry

created_at.description: Timestamp at which the time entry is created

updated_at.description: Time stamp at which the time entry is updated

executed_at.description: Date time at which the time entry is executed

custom_fields.description: Key value pairs containing the names and values of custom fields

value_schema.description: time entry details that needs to be updated
